quizDescription: Test your knowledge of horror movies with this spine-chilling trivia quiz!

questions.question: In which horror movie does a group of kids encounter a shape-shifting clown named Pennywise?
questions.explanation: Pennywise the Dancing Clown terrorizes a group of kids in the horror movie 'It,' based on Stephen King's novel.

questions.question: Which horror movie features a haunted house located in Rhode Island and is based on real events?
questions.explanation: 'The Amityville Horror' is based on the real-life haunting that occurred in a house in Amityville, New York.

questions.question: Which horror movie features a family tormented by a supernatural entity that only appears in the dark?
questions.explanation: 'Lights Out' centers around a malevolent entity that can only be seen when the lights are out.

questions.question: In the movie 'The Shining,' what phrase is repeatedly written by Jack Torrance?
questions.explanation: Jack Torrance repeatedly types the phrase 'All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy' in 'The Shining.'

questions.question: Which horror movie revolves around a videotape that curses anyone who watches it, leading to their death in seven days?
questions.explanation: 'The Ring' is a horror film that centers on a cursed videotape that brings death to anyone who watches it within seven days.
